title: In the interest of clarity, why not place a visual indicator on whether Tryndamere has ult?
body:
Gets old watching teammates ignore back pings and spend 40 minutes trying to chase and focus him only to die under turret when he deploys the ult.

This would be a good one to hit if your goal is to patch out as much stupidity as possible and make the game idiot-proof.

It seems like every other champ in the game has some visual indicator they are going to cheat death, but not Tryndamere. He continues to surprise players that apparently forget there is an ultimate in his kit.
